[30;1m5 | [0m[35m# - Exceptions for exceptional conditions that a reasonable application may wish to catch.[0m
[30;1m6 | [0m[35m# - Errors for exceptional conditions that are not reasonable to catch.[0m
[30;1m7 | [0m[35m# for instance syntax errors in a template should be called ...Error,[0m
